price: Er hat keinen Teilhaber. Dies ist mir befohlen worden, und ich bin der erste der (Ihm) Ergebenen.
arabic: لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُۥۖ وَبِذَٰلِكَ أُمِرۡتُ وَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: lā sharīka lahu wabidhālika umir'tu wa-anā awwalu al-mus'limīna
